title: Tomcc：找到了一种解决Oculus崩溃办法
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2016-8-26 17:35 编辑 

Tomcc：If your MC still crashes on Rift, /r/oculus found a solution for another rare crash. Those guys are good!
Tomcc：如果你在用Oculus Rift玩MC的过程中还是崩溃的话，Oculus找到了一个办法用于解决另一种罕见的崩溃。那些人干的漂亮！https://www.reddit.com/r/oculus/ ... ch_problems/d6nf8yb
